rules.title: Competition Rules
rules.content: Starting from September 1st, you have the opportunity to help your customers with electricity contracts already at contract signing. Flyttsmart ensures that customers receive help with both termination and new contracts. Each unique power of attorney gives 1 or 2 points, which means that a contract signing can give a maximum of 2 points. 1 point if the buyer signs the power of attorney (new contract) and 1 point if the seller signs the power of attorney (termination). The broker who collects the most points between September 1st and November 30th wins a GOLDEN TICKET, worth SEK 10,000. We will also draw a bonus winner from all those who have submitted electricity powers of attorney, worth SEK 3,000.
